action.action-desc: Mr. Hill introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To clarify that volunteers at a children’s consignment event are not employees under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Children’s Consignment Event Recognition Act of 2017.

The purpose of this Act is to ensure that individuals and families may pool their resources, time, efforts, and energies, with or without the assistance of a facilitator, to sell, purchase, and otherwise exchange children’s clothing, toys, bedding, furniture, and related accessories, and maternity clothing and accessories without fear that they will be deemed to be employees under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 (29 U.S.C. 201 et seq.).

section.header: Amendments to the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938
section.text: Section 3(e) of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 (29 U.S.C. 203) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking and (4) and inserting , (4), (5), and (6); and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: The term employee does not include—

clause.text: individuals who volunteer their services before, during, or after a children’s consignment event with or without the assistance of a facilitator and—

subclause.text: provide not less than 15 items for sale at such children’s consignment event; and
receive a right to shop from the facilitator at such children’s consignment event before such event is open to the general public; or

clause.text: the spouse, children, spouses of children, grandchildren, parents, and parents of spouses of the individuals described in clause (i).

subparagraph.text: For purposes of this paragraph, the term children’s consignment event means a sale or other event in which—

clause.text: not less than 90 percent of the fair market value, in the aggregate, of the items offered for sale at such event are—

subclause.text: resale items offered for sale on consignment by consignors; and

clause.text: such event is held in a single physical location and is open to the public for the sale of goods for 8 or fewer sale days within any 30-day period.

subparagraph.text: For purposes of this paragraph, the term facilitator means a person that organizes or hosts a children’s consignment event, or otherwise actively provides an opportunity for individuals described in subparagraph (A) to volunteer at a children’s consignment event.
